document_data.title: Master of Chains
document_data.author: [[Jess Lebow]]
document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.mainbody: e novel is set in [[Erlkazar]] and follows the brothers [[Liam (rebel)|Liam]] and [[Ryder]] of the [[Crimson Awl]] rebels as they oppose the [[vampire]] [[Shyressa]] of the [[Twisted Rune]] and Lord [[Purdun]] of [[Ahlarkhem]].
document_data.Synopsis: The novel is set in [[Erlkazar]] and follows the brothers [[Liam (rebel)|Liam]] and [[Ryder]] of the [[Crimson Awl]] rebels as they oppose the [[vampire]] [[Shyressa]] of the [[Twisted Rune]] and Lord [[Purdun]] of [[Ahlarkhem]].
